name: FACES SF- Family and Child Empowerment Services SF
description: To nurture, teach and empower San Francisco's underserved children and families to transform their lives.
fullDescription: To nurture, teach and empower San Francisco's underserved children and families to transform their lives.
whatTheyOffer: FACES SF serves San Francisco communities through three channels: child development, family support services and workforce development. All three programs work together, providing a holistic approach to empowering the communities that we serve. The child development program provides subsidized early childhood education at three locations throughout the city: Haight Ashbury, Western Addition, and Bayview Hunters Point. In addition, FACES SF manages a network of over 50 licensed, in-home childcare
